Classification of the Listed Companies Under the Listing Bye-Law (2053)
List of "A" Group Company for the F/Y 061/62

Unnamed: 1: Note: It denotes the profit for the F/Y 2003/2004 is Provisional unaudited figure.

Criteria for the classification of the listed companies as per Listing Bye-Laws 2053
1. The paid-up capital of the company must be at least Rs. 20.00 million
2. The number of equity shareholder must be at least 1000
3.The company must have made the public floatation as per bye-laws 9 (ka) sub-byelaws (4).
4. The company must be in profit since last three years.
5. The book value of the share should not be less than its paid up value.
6. Submission of the financial statement within six months from  the closure of the F/Y
